src:
GDB获得首个东马合约 总值2.13亿
07 Nov 2019, 07:02 by Surin Murugiah
（吉隆坡7日讯）建筑服务公司GDB控股（GDB Holdings Bhd）获得东马的首个合约，在沙巴亚庇建造Hyatt Centric酒店，暂时合约总值2亿1330万令吉。
GDB今日向大马交易所报备，子公司Grand Dynamic Builders私人有限公司执行了合成统一（Hap Seng Consolidated Bhd）子公司Sunhill Ventures私人有限公司的意向书（LoI），承接五星Hyatt Centric酒店的建筑工程。
根据文告，这座22层的项目，有222间客房，将迎合冒险、休闲和商务客人的需要，是通往商业区、购物商场、餐厅及沙巴和婆罗洲其他景点的便捷通道。
合约为期22.5个月，从2020年1月2日开工，并预计在2021年11月16日完工。
GDB集团董事经理谢汉正表示，这是公司第二次赢得合成的合约。该公司此前于2017年获得位于吉隆坡市中心，26层高Menara Hap Seng 3的合约。
他指出，加上这项新合约，公司年内取得总值8亿6530万令吉的新合约。
“连同截至6月杪的订单，未完成订单约为12亿令吉，将在未来3年内确认。”
截至2时40分，该股起1仙或2.67%，报38.5仙，市值为2亿4062万令吉。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
GDB lands first East Malaysia contract worth RM213.3 mil

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
GDB wins first East Malaysia contract with a total value of 213 million
07 Nov 2019, 07:02 by Surin Murugiah
KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - Construction services company GDB Holdings Bhd won the first contract from East Malaysia to build the Hyatt Centric Hotel in Kota Kinabalu, with a temporary contract value of RM233.3 million.
GDB reported to Bursa Malaysia today that its subsidiary, Grand Dynamic Builders Sdn Bhd, has implemented a letter of intent (LoI) from Sunhill Ventures Sdn Bhd, a subsidiary of Hap Seng Consolidated Bhd, to undertake the construction of the five-star Hyatt Centric hotel.
According to the statement, this 22-story project, with 222 rooms, will cater to the needs of adventure, leisure and business guests, and is a convenient gateway to business districts, shopping malls, restaurants and other attractions in Sabah and Borneo.
The contract lasts for 22.5 months and will start on January 2, 2020 and is expected to be completed on November 16, 2021.
Xie Hanzheng, managing director of GDB Group, said that this is the second time the company has won a synthetic contract. The company previously won a 26-story Menara Hap Seng 3 contract in downtown Kuala Lumpur in 2017.
He pointed out that with the new contract, the company won a new contract worth RM865.3 million during the year.
“With orders placed as of June, uncompleted orders are approximately RM1.2 billion and will be confirmed within the next three years.”
As of 2:40, the stock rose 1 sen or 2.67% to 38.5 sen and the market value was RM 406.62 million.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
GDB lands first East Malaysia contract worth RM213.3 mil

Via theedgemarkets.com
